composite_description.message: Let the developers if changes to the CSS properties will trigger a composite operation

layout_description.message: Let the developers if changes to the CSS properties will trigger a layout operation

paint_description.message: Let the developers if changes to the CSS properties will trigger a paint operation

willTriggerLayout.description: Report message to show when the validation fails
willTriggerLayout.message: Changes to '$1' will trigger: '$2'. Which can impact performance.
